transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Sir, very good afternoon, sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir, this is Gopal Krishna from IndiaMART branch management. I called you on Saturday, sir. Asked me to call back on Monday. Saturday you were outside. Sorry, I spoke to you on Friday.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Friday ko baat hui thi sir. To aap mera Gopal main aaj nahi kar paunga.
Customer: Sir, maine aapko kya bataya sir, main aapko ghar ko chahiye to main aapko contact karunga sir karke, hai na?
Executive: Sir, ye to nahi baat hui thi sir, aapne mere ko pehle ye bola tha karne ke liye.
Customer: Sir, I have a call record sir.
Executive: Why should I tell lie to you?
Customer: Sir, aapne mere ko bola tha na Monday call karo, fir Monday main aapse final baat karta hu aur confirm.
Executive: Main bata dunga karke main aapko bataya tha.
Executive: I will tell you after when I need.
Executive: To sir, abhi aapne decide nahi kiya kya aap?
Customer: Main bata dunga sir.
Executive: Nahi, batane ke liye time nahi hai na sir, ki aapko itna time follow bhi kar rahe hai. Aapka marzi se main kam karna chahiye kya?
Executive: Sir, aapke marzi se kam nahi karne ke sir, aapke marzi se humne call kiya na sir.
Customer: [Unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called to follow up on subscription.

- Customer said he would contact when needed.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to remind customer of previous conversation.

- Customer said he would inform the executive later.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, follow up, confirmation
